title: Busan Asiad Main Stadium
text:
Busan Asiad Stadium or Asiad Main Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Busan">Busan</a>, South Korea, that was built for the <a href="2002%20Asian%20Games">2002 Asian Games</a> and was also used for matches at the <a href="2002%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">2002 FIFA World Cup</a>. It has a capacity of 53,769. The stadium hosted the opening and closing ceremonies of the 2002 Asian Games and was also the venue of <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%202002%20Asian%20Games">athletics</a> events during the games.
2002 FIFA World Cup.
The stadium was one of the venues of the <a href="2002%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">2002 FIFA World Cup</a>, and held the following matches:
